# including(_:)

**Type Method**

Show only points of interest belonging to certain categories from the provided array.

## Declaration

```swift
static func including(_ categories: [MKPointOfInterestCategory]) -> PointOfInterestCategories
```

## Parameters

- **categories**: An array of point of interest categories to include.

## Return Value

Returns the points of interest to include.

## Modifying the categories to include or exclude

- **excluding(_:)**: Show all points of interest except those belonging to certain categories using the array you provide.
- **excluding(_:)**: Show all points of interest except those belonging to certain categories using the list you provide.
- **including(_:)**: Show only points of interest belonging to certain categories from the provided list.
